name: rpsls
description: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock (RPSLS) is a variant of the all time famous game [Rock, Paper, Scissors](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rock-paper-scissors). It was introduced in TV-Series [The Big Bang Theory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Big_Bang_Theory). According to Sheldon(the character introduces this game in The Big Bang Theory), adding two more options reduces the probability that the game will result in a tie.
